passage_text: Lisette is also a familiar form (English, French, and German) of the name Lise (English, French, German, and Scandinavian) as well as a variation (French) of Lisa. Lisette is rare as a baby girl name. At the modest peak of its usage in 1999, 0.020% of baby girls were given the name Lisette. It was #615 in rank then. The baby name has dropped out of favor since then, and is currently of very light use.

[ 2 syll. li-set-te, lis-e- tte ] The baby girl name Lisette is pronounced as Liy-S EH T or Liy-Z AH T †. Lisette is used predominantly in the English, French, and German languages. Its origin is Hebrew and Germanic. Lisette is rare as a baby girl name. At the modest peak of its usage in 1999, 0.020% of baby girls were given the name Lisette. It was #615 in rank then. The baby name has dropped out of favor since then, and is currently of very light use.

Lisette is a form of the name Elizabeth. The name Elizabeth is derived from Elisabet (ελισαβε&tau), the Greek form of the Hebrew name Elisheva (אֱלִישֶׁבַע). The Hebrew name Elisheva, appears in the Old Testament where Elisheva is the wife of Aaron. The name Elizabeth appears in the New Testament where Elizabeth is the mother of John the Baptist. Lisette is generally used as a girl's name. It consists of 7 letters and 2 syllables and is pronounced Li-sette. In the U.S. in 2014, it ranked 2976 in baby name popularity for girls with 57 occurrences. Less than 5 boys were given the name.

Lisette /lis-ette/ [2 sylls.] as a girls' name. Lisette's roots are Hebrew, English and American, and the name Lisette means God is my oath. Lisette is a version of Elizabeth (Hebrew). Lisette is also a form of Lisa (English, Hebrew). Lisette is also used as a form of Lizette (American, Hebrew). Displayed below is a comparison of the popularity of the girl name Lisette and related names. Bette, Elizabeth (#14 a year ago) , Lisa (#750) , Lisbeth, Lise, Lissette, Lissie, Lizeth and Lizette are the prominent alternative forms of Lisette ranked in the Top 1000.

American Meaning: The name Lisette is an American baby name. In American the meaning of the name Lisette is: Devoted to God. Hebrew Meaning: The name Lisette is a Hebrew baby name. In Hebrew the meaning of the name Lisette is: From Elisheba, meaning either oath of God, or God is satisfaction. Greek Meaning: The name Lisette is a Greek baby name. In Greek the meaning of the name Lisette is: From the Hebrew Elisheba, meaning either oath of God, or God is satisfaction.

Origin of the name Lisette: Originally a short form of Elisabeth (God is my oath), Lisa is now commonly bestowed as an inde-pendent given name. Var: Leesa, Leeza, Leezah, Leisa, Liza.
